absyn

Class CodeDeclaration

  • java.lang.Object
    • absyn.Absyn
      • absyn.ClassMemberDeclaration
        • absyn.CodeDeclaration
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConstructorDeclaration, MethodDeclaration

    public abstract class CodeDeclaration
extends ClassMemberDeclaration
    A node of abstract syntax representing the declaration of a constructor or method of a Kitten class.
    Author:
    Fausto Spoto

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Command getBody()
      Yields the abstract syntax of the body of the constructor or method.
      FormalParameters getFormals()
      Yields the abstract syntax of the formal parameters of the constructor or method.
      CodeSignature getSignature()
      Yields the signature of this method or constructor declaration.
      void translate(java.util.Set<ClassMemberSignature> done)
      Translates this constructor or method into intermediate Kitten code.

      • Methods inherited from class absyn.ClassMemberDeclaration

        toDot, typeCheck

      • Methods inherited from class absyn.Absyn

        getPos

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getFormals

        public FormalParameters getFormals()
        Yields the abstract syntax of the formal parameters of the constructor or method.
        Returns:
        the abstract syntax of the formal parameters of the constructor or method

      • getBody

        public Command getBody()
        Yields the abstract syntax of the body of the constructor or method.
        Returns:
        the abstract syntax of the body of the constructor or method

      • getSignature

        public CodeSignature getSignature()
        Yields the signature of this method or constructor declaration.
        Specified by:
        getSignature in class ClassMemberDeclaration
        Returns:
        the signature of this method or constructor declaration. Yields null if type-checking has not been performed yet

      • translate

        public void translate(java.util.Set<ClassMemberSignature> done)
        Translates this constructor or method into intermediate Kitten code. This amounts to translating its body with a continuation containing a return bytecode. This way, if a method does not have an explicit return statement, it is automatically put at its end.
        Parameters:
        done - the set of code signatures that have been already translated
